bug.author: dynamor2019
bug.summary: matplotlib.mlab has been removed, update code please
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
a link to the documentation entry <denchmark-link:https://tensorflow.google.cn/tutorials/estimator/boosted_trees_model_understanding>https://tensorflow.google.cn/tutorials/estimator/boosted_trees_model_understanding</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
A bug I found in "TensorFlow > Learn > TensorFlow Core > Tutorials > Gradient Boosted Trees: Model understanding" as below: matplotlib.mlab has been removed @ version 3.1.0 "<denchmark-link:https://matplotlib.org/3.1.0/api/api_changes.html>https://matplotlib.org/3.1.0/api/api_changes.html</denchmark-link> " but the tutorials still uses class for plotting, i can not get the result follow this. so would you mind adjust this for correct code? i am a beginner for tensorflow and python, so fix it by myself is difficult for me ,thanks

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dynamor2019>@dynamor2019</denchmark-link> Thanks for filing this issue. Yes, we need to update the tutorial. We need to use from . So need to import like this . Thanks!

Thanks for the report. That file lives over here in the tensorflow/docs repo: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/estimator/boosted_trees_model_understanding.ipynb>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/estimator/boosted_trees_model_understanding.ipynb</denchmark-link>
Please send a pull request
Can I make a PR for this Issue ? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lamberta>@lamberta</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link>
I am closing the issue as the related PR got merged. Please feel free to reopen if this was not resolved. Thanks!
